Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Xavier Becerra did initiate a lawsuit against the Little Sisters of the Poor.
Understate: The claim understates the extent of Xavier Becerra's involvement in litigation against the Little Sisters of the Poor.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Xavier Becerra never sued any nuns.

Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as Xavier Becerra was involved in litigation against the Little Sisters of the Poor as a representative of California.
